RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 46. Claiming Purse 17100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 31 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THANKSDAD chased early, dueled around the turn and until late stretch, edged clear late under strong handling. WHO CAN WIN set the early pace and dueled on the lead, held stubbornly in the drive and weakened slightly late. GOING PRIMETIME had good position early, swung three wide in the stretch and closed willingly. PLAYING BALL had good position just off the speed on the inside, lacked a bid late and went evenly. JUST INSPIRED saved ground and was no threat.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: PACIFIC GROVE broke sharply and quickly made the lead, set a moderate pace with a clear lead, widened in the stretch under firm handling to win as much the best. ASHWICKEN was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch and split horses, was no match for the winner but held place. IMA SURE BET was allowed to settle and failed to menace. SUPER GEUSE chased the winner for three quarters, then gave way.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: KADESH dueled, on the lead while between horses, drew clear in the stretch and widened late under left handed urging. KHALFANI dueled on the lead three wide for a half, was no match for the winner late but was second best. KEYED ON TOP dueled on the lead from the rail and gradually weakened. RACE.FOOTNOTES: DERBY INCLUDED dueled on the lead for a half, shook clear in the stretch and widened late while being ridden out. RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 31 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYRRH was away alertly and quickly gained a clear lead, led throughout and lasted late. TALK DIRTY raced mid pack early, rallied in the stretch five wide, closed fast and was quickly gaining on the winner. FREE TO RUN chased the winner throughout and finished willingly in a good effort. RUN AWAY FEVER was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch on the inside and improved late. HALOFIED trailed early, passed tiring rivals while no threat. AWESOME WONDER had good position early, rallied at the quarter pole, put in her bid and hung late. LINDA LOVES LACE was off slowly, saved ground and lacked a late response. MY BACK PAGES was no factor. BOUJEE KITTEN had brief foot and was through early.

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $20 ,000 Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEISTHEHERO was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout, drifted out in the stretch and widened late under right handed urging. PULPIT'S PURRFECT chased the winner throughout, saved ground, could not gain late but was second best. TEMPLEMENT allowed to settle early, had a mild bid in the stretch while no threat. MALICED hopped at the start, raced three wide and was no threat. BLINKERS chased inside and tired in the lane.
